nnMakeMultilayerPerceptron

Directly creates a multilayer perceptron that is ready to use in calculations. See documentation for multilayer perceptron for more details.

Inputs/outputs

Arguments
Name string, not empty Name of the multilayer perceptron object to create.
NumInputs integer, > 0 Number of input nodes, not including input bias.
NumOutputs integer, > 0 Number of output nodes.
HiddenLayerSizes array of integers Number of nodes in each hidden layer, not including biases. Each element must be greater than zero.
Weights string, not empty Name of the weights object created using nnMakeWeights().
Returns
Name of the newly created neural network object.
